main event: A witness reported a UFO sighting in Lake View, South Carolina on April 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as a small, round, white light that moved rapidly in various directions,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes,The witness lost sight of the object when it passed through cloud cover,There were similar reports in the area during the same time period,The report indicates insufficient data for proper evaluation.
witness description: A newspaper delivery person who observed the object while on their route.
